detailed_with_name: This image shows David Bowie with his iconic lightning bolt makeup across his face, highlighting his green eyes and red hair against a vibrant red background, a look famously associated with his Ziggy Stardust persona.

summary_with_name: David Bowie in iconic lightning bolt makeup against red background.
summary_no_name: Man with lightning bolt makeup against vibrant red background.
